Body: I've been programming a game for android and been using my nexus 5 for debugging purposes for a while. Unfortunately, today it isnt being recognized anymore. Things I've tried to fix it:Enabled USB debuggingTried another cableUnplugged repluggedrestarted android studiorestarted laptopSwitched to MTPSwitched to PTPFactory reset devicekilled adb server then started it againSince it doesnt come up on the device manager at all - I was unable to reinstall drivers.I've been trying to fix this for about 4 hours now and I'm starting to go crazy. Thanks in advance.
Title: Nexus 5 not recognized at all by device manager

history.Text: I've been programming a game for android and been using my nexus 5 for debugging purposes for a while. Unfortunately, today it isnt being recognized anymore. Things I've tried to fix it:- Enabled USB debugging- Tried another cable- Unplugged replugged- restarted android studio- restarted laptop- Switched to MTP- Switched to PTPSince it doesnt come up on the device manager at all - I was unable to reinstall drivers.I've been trying to fix this for about 4 hours now and I'm starting to go crazy. Thanks in advance, Chris
Nexus 5 not recognized at all by device manager

I've been programming a game for android and been using my nexus 5 for debugging purposes for a while. Unfortunately, today it isnt being recognized anymore. Things I've tried to fix it:- Enabled USB debugging- Tried another cable- Unplugged replugged- restarted android studio- restarted laptop- Switched to MTP- Switched to PTP- Factory reset device- killed adb server then started it againSince it doesnt come up on the device manager at all - I was unable to reinstall drivers.I've been trying to fix this for about 4 hours now and I'm starting to go crazy. Thanks in advance, Chris

I've been programming a game for android and been using my nexus 5 for debugging purposes for a while. Unfortunately, today it isnt being recognized anymore. Things I've tried to fix it:- Enabled USB debugging- Tried another cable- Unplugged replugged- restarted android studio- restarted laptop- Switched to MTP- Switched to PTP- Factory reset device- killed adb server then started it againSince it doesnt come up on the device manager at all - I was unable to reinstall drivers.I've been trying to fix this for about 4 hours now and I'm starting to go crazy. Thanks in advance.
